Variables

TestFmk_ProfileCfg gCSIStreamProfileCfg
 CSI Stream Profile Configuration: This should be used while loading the profile into the Test Framework.
 
uint8_t gDataCube [SOC_XWR16XX_DSS_L3RAM_SIZE]
 This is the data cube data buffer which is exposed to the application and is used to store the ADC samples. Applications would need to place this in an appropriate memory section using the linker command file.
 
CSIStreamProfile_MCB * gPtrCSIStreamProfileMCB
 This is the pointer to the CSI Stream Profile MCB.
 

Detailed Description

CSI Streaming Profile written for the XWR14xx.

Function Documentation

static int32_t TestFmkCSIStream_EDMAAllocateCBUFFChannel ( CBUFF_EDMAInfo *  ptrEDMAInfo,
CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg *  ptrEDMACfg 
)
static

Description
This is the registered CBUFF EDMA channel allocation function which allocates EDMA channels for HW Triggered sessions

Parameters
[in]ptrEDMAInfoPointer to the EDMA Information
[out]ptrEDMACfgPopulated EDMA channel configuration
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0
static void TestFmkCSIStream_edmaCallbackFxn ( uintptr_t  arg,
uint8_t  tcCode 
)
static

Description
This is the function which is registered by the profile and is invoked on the completion of the EDMA Transfer

Parameters
[in]argThis is the handle to the profile
[in]tcCodeTransfer completion code for the channel that completes transfer.
Return values
NotApplicable.
static void TestFmkCSIStream_EDMAFreeCBUFFChannel ( CBUFF_EDMAChannelCfg *  ptrEDMACfg)
static

Description
This is the registered CBUFF EDMA channel free function which frees allocated EDMA channels for HW Triggered sessions

Return values
Notapplicable
